title: When Six Watts per Kilo is Slow: Climbing Records, Strava KoMs Will be Shattered at the Tour de France
content:
The Tour de France will set wild new performance benchmarks as a fine-tuned peloton pushes watts-per-kilo numbers never seen before.

Read the full article at When Six Watts per Kilo is Slow: Climbing Records, Strava KoMs Will be Shattered at the Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
